subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Shea Weber, a defenseman for the Nashville Predators, has been offered a 14-year, $100 million deal by Philadelphia, reports say, at a time when N.H.L. owners hope to eliminate such large contracts.
snippet: Shea Weber, a defenseman for the Nashville Predators, has been offered a 14-year, $100 million deal by Philadelphia, reports say, at a time when N.H.L. owners hope to eliminate such large contracts.
